document.heading: NoMA Residential Development Tax Abatement Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-237, the “NoMA Residential Development Tax Abatement Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-670. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 1, 2012, and Nov. 15, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 2, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-554 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-237 became effective on Mar. 19, 2013.
